roleset.name: pass into law, again

role.descr: law that exists after bill's repassing

example.name: Args 0 & 1, passive
example.text: Every order , resolution , or vote to which the concurrence of the Senate and House of Representatives may be necessary ... shall be repassed by two - thirds of the Senate and House of Representatives .

propbank.arg: Every order , resolution , or vote to which the concurrence of the Senate and House of Representatives may be necessary
by two - thirds of the Senate and House of Representatives

roleset.note: REPASS-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to pass.01. (from repass.01-v)
For additional examples, see pass.01. (from repass.01-v)
